Topic: Illustrate plants with and without water and light.
Evidence Statements: The student can draw a plant that is healthy and growing with water and light.
The student can draw a plant that is not healthy when it lacks water.
The student can draw a plant that is not healthy when it lacks light.
The student can represent how patterns show that plants need water to survive by drawing a comparison of plants with and without water.
The student can represent how patterns show that plants need light to survive by drawing a comparison of plants with and without light.
